betterquesting.name: Not leaving those leaves
betterquesting.desc:
I wonder if I could get some use out of those leaves.

To harvest leaves I need some shears though. I wonder if crude wooden shears will work for me.

Chopping these leaves down in fine strips should get me some fiber.

And finally, intertwining some fiber yields me some twine.

betterquesting.name: Chop chop
betterquesting.desc:
Great, they gave me a bit of Fertilizer in addition to those Saplings. This means I can at least get some wood.

First, I need to make a Chopping Block.

Then, I need to use my axe to chop the log down to planks. I probably have to spam my axe for a bit until I get them. Also, I don't assume I will get many planks for a log piece, I have to work towards getting better axes soon.

I also need some sticks. Chopping those planks down again should work.

betterquesting.name: A beginner's furnace
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I have access to stone, I can maybe build a basic furnace that can cook a few things.

First I need to form the rocks into Cobblestone blocks.

With those Cobblestone blocks, I can then make a beginner's furnace. This furnace's fuel needs to be lit up with my Firestarter to start the smelting process.

betterquesting.name: Strain your ears
betterquesting.desc:
I think I saw some clean water nearby. I haven't seen any animals on this planet, but maybe there are fish I can catch. I don't have the resources for a fishing net yet, but a simple strainer could work as well for now.

For that I need something like a Wooden Hopper that can store caught fish. Then I can build strainers out of them.

I have to do some research how different positions in the water will get me more yield. The following options I need to research: 1.) Flowing Water or Water Source, 2.) Distance between Strainers and 3.) Water Height

Also, I assume dependant of how tight the twines are, I will get different resources.

betterquesting.name: A better furnace
betterquesting.desc:
I should work towards a better furnace out of harder materials. 

I can't harvest Obsidian yet, but maybe I can smack Obsidian with a Hammer (shift right click) and get some shards that I can use.

But the furnace surely needs a house that is more weatherproof. I can probably upgrade the Cob to some Wattle and Daub.

betterquesting.name: Burnt earth
betterquesting.desc:
So, it seems the whole surface is covered mainly with lava and ash, no plants or animals. I wonder how I should be able to survive here. I probably shouldn't exhaust myself too much until I have a reliable food source. 

Maybe if I dig around I will find something? They gave me some tools at least, but they don't seem to be durable. I have to be careful not to waste them.

Let's hope they will give me something in exchange for those things.

betterquesting.name: Light it up
betterquesting.desc:
The Firestarter is very important as I can now make charcoal. But it's not easy. The Strainers should give me the materials I need.

Now I can make a Charcoal Pit. I need to cover log piles with Loam on all sides and light it up with Firestarter. The bigger, probably the better. And then of course wait until it is ready.

And with Charcoal I'm finally able to make some torches for more light.

betterquesting.name: Fruitful work
betterquesting.desc: It seems that those saplings are not dead after all. I've never seen or eaten that fruit before, but hey, better than starving.

betterquesting.name: Gathering while it's day
betterquesting.desc:
I see there are several bones and stone piles laying around. Maybe something useful can be found from them. I wonder who or what died here to leave those bones behind.

Let's wander around a bit while it's still day and gather some materials that might prove useful.

betterquesting.name: Finally storage
betterquesting.desc:
I'm running out of room in my inventory. Let's see if I can build some basic storage.

I need a saw first though. With a saw I am able to make the pins and slabs required for chests and cupboards.

betterquesting.name: Better tools
betterquesting.desc:
With Flint and Twine I should be able to make tools like the ones I got to start with.

I should flake the flint first, for example by smashing on some hard material (left click on Basalt).

With the flaked flint I can then make tools.

betterquesting.name: Regrowth
betterquesting.desc:
I found some kind of plant life. Maybe if I show this to the people at home, they can give me something in return.

With the Pasture Seed I got in return, I assume I can grow that on dirt.

Now that I have Dry Grass, maybe I can dig through it like the Coarse Loamy Dirt to get some plant life.

betterquesting.name: Let's dry it!
betterquesting.desc:
I noticed that if I dig through the Loamy Dirt I can retrieve some mud (sneak right click).

Some Drying Racks can maybe turn mud into something useful. But for the mud being able to dry I need to put the racks in a closed room.

betterquesting.name: Crystallizing
betterquesting.desc: With the Crystal Shards I might be able to crystallize the dusts into gems and crystals. I need to put the Condenser into a casing as well and then pour liquified crystal shards on top of it while the dust is put into the condenser.

betterquesting.name: Fire me up
betterquesting.desc:
Being able to make fire would be a very useful thing to progress.

Let's see what happens if I right click a rock with flint...

With the Firestarter I can finally light up some unlit torches that I found (by right clicking them or with an already lit torch; I can also light up unlit torches I have in hand by right clicking them on a lit torch in world)

betterquesting.name: Rocking all over the world
betterquesting.desc:
With the clay I have I wonder if firing the clay in a furnace would give me the opportunity to make a basic bucket.

I then would be able to move lava and make a basic Cobblestone Generator. Let's hope this works on this planet.

betterquesting.name: Exiled
betterquesting.desc:
I can't believe I lost my case. Now I'm here on that unknown exile planet. I don't think I deserve that. I have to find my way back home, somehow...

At least they are obligated to help me so that I don't die here. If they know I'm willing to work for my survival they are willing to trade. I guess that's why that portal is here. Still, I have no idea what I will expect here on this planet.

They gave me one piece of advice though. "A lot is different there. If you want to survive, make sure you investigate carefully and adapt." Not sure yet what they mean with that, but I probably should follow that advice.

betterquesting.name: Foundry
betterquesting.desc:
From all the metals I gathered from the strainer the only one I seem to be able to process is Copper. I wonder if I can constuct a device that is able to process the other ores. I also need a heat resistant clay variant that is able to hold the liquids.

To create the molds I need a special Mold Crafting Station which accepts Refractory Clay Blocks.

betterquesting.name: Basic Piping
betterquesting.desc: With the strainers I need now some basic automation to be able to manage the income of resources.

betterquesting.name: Bucket
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I have access to basic metals, I should have a way to make a better bucket.

From Tin Plates I can now finally make a bucket which should help moving those hot metal fluids.

betterquesting.name: Adobe Crafter
betterquesting.desc:
I have now metal ingots and plates, but I should work towards getting gears. It seems that this process is a bit harder to achieve. I need a more heat resistant material in Adobe.

I wonder if I could use the Rush Seeds that I have to get some Thatching. Another way would be probably to use Grass.

To make the Adobe Brick Mix I need to dry the Thatching on the Drying Racks I have.

To form the mix I should craft brick forms from split logs. To get them, I need to cut the bark from logs with a Work Blade (by shift right clicking) and then some kind of Axe or Hatchet can split the stripped logs (by right clicking)

Putting the Brick Mix into form now only requires waiting. I should parallelize to speed up and also make sure it's safe from rain.

With dry bricks I can now craft Adobe Blocks.

betterquesting.name: Alchemical Construct
betterquesting.desc:
I've read something in one of the Magical Books about a portal that leads even further to the core of the planet. To build it, I need to learn about Alchemy first.

Alchemy needs research and testing. Basically I need to point a Beam Cannon with lots of Embers in it at an Exchange Tablet which contains the recipe. A pedestal needs to be nearby, filled with ash. But how much ash? Who knows! I need to test that.

With 10 Archaic Edges I can then finally make the portal to the core from the cavern, activated again with my Exoria Artifact.

betterquesting.name: Alloys Mk 2
betterquesting.desc:
I found another way to make alloys. It needs dusts though, but I worry about that later. Because I also found finally a way to make some red dust which might have the capability to create power in it. 

This 2x2x2 multiblock that I have in mind should also be able to make that Redstone. All that I need in order to make it should be in the Exoria Core.

betterquesting.name: Metal Growth
betterquesting.desc: Now I have all the seeds and saplings. As soon as I have metal processing, I can try to trade and maybe they give me something for my progress.

betterquesting.name: I can water
betterquesting.desc: Growing the crops faster without constantly using Fertilizer might be something to work for.

betterquesting.name: Automating crops
betterquesting.desc: It's time to automate crops, I developed some sort of multifarm that can do the work for me. I will make it out of Sandstone as it is probably easiest to get for me.

betterquesting.name: Orientating
betterquesting.desc:
I'm in a new weird dimension now and I need to orientate. This planet is very foggy all over, but has some elevated areas above the fog with some plant life.

I revamped my compass to be able to locate biomes.

I need saplings from those trees though. I found out that I need to break the smallest targetable branch directly adjacent to leaves to be able to get them.

betterquesting.name: Further Regrowth
betterquesting.desc:
I also wonder if the people at home would trade for me some tree types that I'm familiar with.

Let's show them what I gathered so far.

I didn't get the saplings directly, but I hope I can dig through the podzol again to get the tree seeds.

betterquesting.name: Faster Digging
betterquesting.desc: This foggy stone is ridiculously hard. I need a faster pickaxe. I should add some Haste Upgrades to my Flexible Pickaxe.

betterquesting.name: More Sieving
betterquesting.desc:
The gravel I found (especially at Border biomes near the Down Biome) has some interesting properties. I wonder what I can find when sieving.

I especially found some Ender Dust, maybe I can refine it with my Condenser?

betterquesting.name: Hard Metal
betterquesting.desc:
At the abyss I found amidst the mist layer some special ore that seems to spawn at the lower mist levels. I need to gather some of that.

I call it Niobium. This metal is much better capable of going through this Foggy Stone material which is otherwise hard to break.

betterquesting.name: I need to breathe
betterquesting.desc:
Going into the mist layer makes it hard to breathe. I need some breathing aid. I wonder if I can use the coal that I found as a filter material for the mist.

To be able to mine the Filter Coal I need to use a Niobium Pickaxe.

betterquesting.name: Miniaturization
betterquesting.desc: I want to develop machines that are much smaller than the setup I had before. Making smaller machines requires me to build a miniaturization setup. I wonder if I can use the lasers I already have to create them.

betterquesting.name: Compact Space
betterquesting.desc:
I should be able to use this method to also compact space. This should help if I want to move my base to the Misty World or separate out parts of my base.

I found at low levels some hard stone with some interesting properties.

betterquesting.name: Resting
betterquesting.desc:
With Grass Seeds and Bonemeal I can create Tall Grass. Breaking it should get me more seeds.

I found some Hemp Seeds. With it I can create string. And with string I should be able to make a bed.

betterquesting.name: Efficiency
betterquesting.desc:
With Iron I have access to more efficient tools and items.

An Iron Axe should double the yield from the chopping block.
And an Iron Strainer Net should last way longer.

betterquesting.name: Compact Ore Processing
betterquesting.desc:
Now I can make my first "magical blocks", combining both magic and tech to finally have good ore processing or machines for other tasks in the future.

The first three machines I have in mind let me get plates, gears, nuggets, ingots and blocks from my ores in much easier way.

betterquesting.name: Compact Storage even more compact
betterquesting.desc: The Miniaturization allows me to also compact storage now. The design I have in mind gives me the opportunity to store hundreds of stacks in one "magical block".

betterquesting.name: Water
betterquesting.desc:
With me being able to move water I can now clean this dirty clay. Putting water in a barrel and then adding Loam or Terra Clay should do it. 

This allows me to make a sturdy Crucible which will be able to melt things. Helpful would be to create water as water seems to be finite on this planet. Lighting a fire under the Crucible would probably make a good heat source (as Ash seems to keep the fire lit forever) and melting Leaves could maybe extract some water. All I need to do is to throw the leaves in the Crucible.

betterquesting.name: Grow your crops
betterquesting.desc:
I definitely need to speed up crop growth. I wonder if I can make some Fertilizer from the Apatite I collected.

Also those bones might prove useful if can grind them down into Bonemeal. I need sharper flint though, I can try to flake the flaked flint a second time.

betterquesting.name: Sluice juice
betterquesting.desc:
Gathering flint is quite cumbersome. I can make Gravel now which means I can maybe sift for flint.

A sluice seems to be best for that. I have designed it to be able to hold 10 items. Adding water to it should yield Flint from Gravel.

betterquesting.name: First Pets
betterquesting.desc: With the ability to make glass, I can now make some fish tanks and start to breed them. That will be nice for food and of course I am not lonely anymore.

betterquesting.name: Fairy Tales
betterquesting.desc:
I should look if I find the home of all the fairies that inhabitate this planet.

Not sure if the structure I found is the home of the fairies, but something used to live here.

And reading the books, gave me quite an insight of some magic knowledge. Not that I used to believe in magic, but surely worth a try.

betterquesting.name: Another abandoned structure
betterquesting.desc: Exploring further I found another structure, seemingly of a more advanced species. I should look if I can get some of their knowledge as well to exploit to my advantage.

betterquesting.name: Too bee or not to bee
betterquesting.desc: In one of those books I read of a smaller fairy subspecies, looking similar to bees. They are very shy and need to be lured. Apparently they like Seed Oil, Fairy Dust and Flowers. The books said that those "bees" are able to gather resources, so this seems to be very useful for the future.

betterquesting.name: Infusing Life
betterquesting.desc: In one of those books I read of a way to bringing dead animals back to life. That sounds not really realistic, but if this life infusing really works, I am in much better shape. I will start and try that on dead fish.

betterquesting.name: Sift Break
betterquesting.desc:
I wonder if sieving the Ash of this planet would give me access to some new resources. For now a basic Fiber Mesh would be enough to test.

Rain would mess up the sieving, but the structure doesn't need to be something fancy, something made out of wood would be sufficient.

betterquesting.name: Mass Gathering
betterquesting.desc: I have improved my effiency in sieving. With this technique I might be able to sieve a 5x5 grid of sieves. Let's start with a 3x3 for now and expand later.

betterquesting.name: Automated Sieving
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I can collect sieved items with the Vacuum I only need to add some kinetic power to move the sieves. I have a design in mind that can auto sieve a 5x5 grid of sieves. 

But how to get the Kinetic Power? Water should be able to move some water wheels and I can then connect those with axles to the Auto Sifter.

betterquesting.name: Making things easier
betterquesting.desc: I now have gained some experience as well in how to store and craft more efficiently. I should use that to my advantage and improve the crafting and storage situation.

betterquesting.name: Collecting
betterquesting.desc:
I also have some ideas how to get some basic automation. The Wooden Hopper is not good enough anymore. I have 2 upgraded designs in mind. I bet both will be useful for different situations. 

The Vacuum needs to be activated with a Lever as I want to disable it if needed.

betterquesting.name: Other Resources
betterquesting.desc: Better Meshes might give me some resources I would otherwise not be able to get. But other resources I might get at a lower chance instead. I have to do some tests which resource has which percentage chance to be gotten for each mesh.

betterquesting.name: Another one bites the dust
betterquesting.desc: I got some white Dust from sieving the black Ash. That is strange. I wonder if sieving it again, gives me access to more useful resources.

betterquesting.name: Diamonds, almost
betterquesting.desc: Oh, I found some Diamonds, didn't expect that at all. It's a low chance but I bet they will be quite useful later. I only need a few dusts more and then I can crystallize them. I also found Prismarine, not sure how useful though.

betterquesting.name: Larger Storage
betterquesting.desc: I have a lot of some resources and I don't even need them right now, maybe later. I need a mass storage for those single items. I have 2 basic designs in mind. I have to decide which one I like better.

betterquesting.name: Glass clear
betterquesting.desc: I will need Glass now for a lot of things. With Casting I should probably be able to smelt Sand into some Glass.

betterquesting.name: What time is it?
betterquesting.desc:
Manually pouring the liquids is quite cumbersome. I need to think about automating some processes. Some sort of timer would be probably quite handy.

I don't think I have any resources to build that though, but I read about a magical device that would work in a similar way.

betterquesting.name: Explosions!
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I have Sulfur, I can make some sort of explosive material. If I contain the explosion in some special structure I might be able to make some Crystal Shards.

My plan is to make a Casing and put the Combustion Heater in. With some fuel and a trigger from the Hourglass I can ignite what is on top. The tricky thing is to contain the explosion. I need to put some glass on the 4 sides to see what is inside and then I can put a Dropper on top which allows me to put the glass above the Combustion Heater without the heat blowing out.

Also just in case something goes wrong, I should encase the structure in some explosion resistant stone. Hardened Stone is a bit expensive, so I will use Concrete for now again.

betterquesting.name: Automated Explosions
betterquesting.desc: To be able to make more shards at a time, I need to upgrade the Combustion Heater and Casing. Also I can probably automate the gathering of the resulting shards.

betterquesting.name: Redstone
betterquesting.desc: If I crush Magmarack on a Crushing Table and alloy it with some dust, I can create POWER!

betterquesting.name: First Crystals
betterquesting.desc: With the Crystallizer I should be able to make my first useful resources. Let's do some tests with Coal and Burnium.

betterquesting.name: Upgrading the Crucible
betterquesting.desc: I should also try to automate the Crucible. My design is an upgraded hopper that will only drop if there is enough space in the Crucible.

betterquesting.name: Better piping
betterquesting.desc:
Oh, some sort of Black Quartz. I think I can use that for some better piping. 

These pipes have some limitations though. An Item Transfer might help with intersections and forced insertions.

betterquesting.name: Gems
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I can crystallize the Diamond I might improve the mesh a third time for some more rare resources. Diamonds need to be flaked on Obsidian instead of Stone.

And indeed, I got Emeralds.

betterquesting.name: Going down
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I am pretty sure I have depleted all the resources I can get from this planet's surface, I need to explore the depths of this planet.

The lower levels are scary, I should keep lights all around.

It seems that I can't get lower than that. But I found some info about to get further down into the caverns. A portal made out of the Runestone I found activated with all the gems with magic properties combined allows me to explore the caverns of this planet.

betterquesting.name: Caminite
betterquesting.desc: By accident I discovered a blend not well known to me. I will call it Caminite. I wonder if it will be useful beside looking pretty.

betterquesting.name: Booooring
betterquesting.desc:
As I ventured deeper, I stumbled across old mechanical constructs. These autonomous golems seem hostile, but stick close to the core of the world. I wonder if there's a reason for this...

But they are at least very intriguing. It seems the Archaic Bricks they are made out of, can be used to create some basic machine logic. I wonder what improved machines I can come up with.

One of those golems said something about a rare resource at the low levels of the caverns. He called it Embers. I need to grind it out of the Bedrock.

I came up with a Bore that gathers these Ember Shards from the Bedrock. The design is not perfect. It needs some fuel and I need to pipe the Embers out, but I can only access it from one side. This means I need to place a Machinical Core above it to have more sides accessible.

betterquesting.name: Allooooying
betterquesting.desc: After long research I found some use for this new magical resource. I can use it to melt metals down which is not very useful on its own as I have the Foundry, but I see the potential of making alloys.

betterquesting.name: Stampede
betterquesting.desc:
I could basically use the Metal Caster to form the Liquids, but I came up with a new method that is worth trying out. Instead of pouring, the liquid will be stamped.

Basically I need a Stamp Base where the liquids go in, a free space above for the Stamp to extend and the Stamper on its own above of that. I can insert a Bar Stamp into it to make Ingots. If I place a Bin below the Stamp Base, I can collect the made ingots much easier.

betterquesting.name: Bronze
betterquesting.desc: So far I came up with 3 alloys that were stable. I know Bronze and Electrum, but I found a new alloy that I have never heard of. I named it Dawnstone. Hopefully it will prove very useful.

betterquesting.name: Roof over my head
betterquesting.desc:
I will probably stay for very long here. I need a roof over my head.

The easiest building material I have access to is probably some Cob.

betterquesting.name: Even more allooooying
betterquesting.desc: I found a way to make the known alloys even easier and even make more alloys that I couldn't make before.

betterquesting.name: I saw a log
betterquesting.desc: With Bronze and Diamonds available, I came up with a design that enables me to automate making planks.

betterquesting.name: Channeling all the liquids
betterquesting.desc: I need a way to transport liquids if I want to expand and automate. (Clicking on the sides of the channels toggles connections)

betterquesting.name: Tinkering
betterquesting.desc: The hardened stone should allow me to make some special durable tools. Unfortunately the uses of them are quite limited, but should still be very useful.

betterquesting.name: AOE
betterquesting.desc: I need now to mine and dig more and more. Having tools with a bigger Area of Effect would be very helpful.

betterquesting.name: Being flexible
betterquesting.desc: Better tools are now in order, especially some that are repairable. I investigated some of the materials I got from sieving and some might work.

betterquesting.name: Additional Machines
betterquesting.desc: With one of those two alloys I can make even more additional machines.

betterquesting.name: Auto Cobble Gen
betterquesting.desc: With a piston I might be able to create a device that is able to break Cobblestone in a Cobblestone Generator. It will still break them apart into Rocks, but at least it is automatic.

betterquesting.name: Compact Storage
betterquesting.desc: Many items that I gather can be automatically compacted to blocks if I just have enough. I wonder if I can find a device that does that for me.

betterquesting.name: Basic Autocrafting
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I have discovered a better Crafting Table, a further simple upgrade might allow me to autocraft. This is very limited though still.

I need to put the crafting components in inventories based on their pattern on one side and for the output I need another inventory on the other side. Then I can start the process with an active lever. (I can also use the blocks themselves instead of inventories, but of course this in world crafting would then only work with blocks and not with items)

There is also an upgraded version which crafts slower but doesn't need in-world crafting.

betterquesting.name: Crushing
betterquesting.desc: I have only the possibility to make Copper Ingots, but Plates are probably more useful for crafting machines. A Crushing Table where I can flatten ingots into plates is very much needed.

betterquesting.name: Heavy Metal
betterquesting.desc: Now I can finally cast any of the metals I gathered. I will need a way to make blocks, ingots and plates for now.

betterquesting.name: Concrete Plans
betterquesting.desc: For my next contraption I will need a factory-like building. I should try to make a bunch of concrete for that.

betterquesting.name: Grinding my gears
betterquesting.desc: I need more than just plates and ingots to be able to make machines. Just casting gears doesn't work. I need a better device to be able to get nuggets and gears.

betterquesting.name: Magical Wood
betterquesting.desc: I noticed that wood logs, placed around one of those Pure Daisies, will eventually transform. And I can repeat this process again (or just leave them there) to get even another wood variant. I wonder what I can do with this wood.

betterquesting.name: Rubber
betterquesting.desc: With that magical wood I can make a special treetap that is able to get resin from trees. Smelting the resin allows me to get Rubber which is needed for the first energy source that I came up with.

betterquesting.name: I made power!!!
betterquesting.desc: So, now let's hope this idea works. Generating Electrostatic Energy with rubber and carpet should give me a tiny bit of energy. This is my plan. Build an Electrostatic Generator, surround it with carpet and walk around it with Rubber Boots on. It's crazy, I know, but it might work.

betterquesting.name: Better fuel
betterquesting.desc: Before I can make power, I probably need better fuel, like some sort of Coal Coke. I found some good heatproof material in the Cavern Dimension.

betterquesting.name: It's a steel
betterquesting.desc: Coal Coke allows me to make steel now, and with the Magmarack I can finally make a Blast Furnace of some sort. Making steel should open a whole lot of possibilities.

betterquesting.name: Charging
betterquesting.desc:
With the 2 big requirements, power and steel, I can now construct a Charger that charges Certus Quartz which I will need to make Fluix Crystals for better power options.

To make Fluix Crystals, I need to throw Charged Certus, Quartz and Redstone into Water.

With Fluix Crystals I can now make Magnets.

betterquesting.name: Thermal Energy
betterquesting.desc:
I need to switch from Electrostatic Energy to a passive reliable energy source like Thermal Energy.

I need Connectors and coils to connect this power to some sort of energy storage.

betterquesting.name: Pump it up
betterquesting.desc:
Gears allow me now to automate better. I should be able to retrieve liquids such as water and lava with this pump that I am about to make.

It needs power, but I don't have that yet. But 4 Wooden Engines should suffice for my needs right now.

betterquesting.name: Powered Smelting
betterquesting.desc: I think I can finally smelt things with power.

betterquesting.name: Lacking Lacquer
betterquesting.desc:
I get this Creosote Oil now as a byproduct and it has some interesting properties. I wonder what I can do with it.

The sticky resin I get from trees I certainly can crush down to some Urushi which might be useful to make Lacquer.

To do that I need a cauldron placed on top of an open drain (right click to toggle) which itself is on top of some fire (or another heat source). One Bucket of water and 4 Ground Urushi eventually ends up making a bucket of Urushi.

With Lacquer wood I can then make Treated Wood which is certainly weather-proof.

betterquesting.name: Power Mk 2
betterquesting.desc:
I discovered a way to make a second sort of power. Kinetic Power from the Wind is a good source of energy. Luckily I can convert the first kind into this second kind of power.

This new power system has new ways to transfer and store power as well.

betterquesting.name: Atomizing
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I have a decent power situation, I can use that power for example to crush metals into dust. I can use this contraption for that.

With the dusts I can now make alloys in the Kiln.

betterquesting.name: Conveynient
betterquesting.desc: I figured out another way of transporting items: Conveyors. I came up with 2 designs. Both need Inserters to move from inventories on the conveyors, but only the cheaper version needs inserters to also insert from conveyors into inventories.

betterquesting.name: I am an Engineer!
betterquesting.desc: My designs are getting more and more complicated. I need a workbench where I can work on and not get overwhelmed by the ideas I have.

betterquesting.name: Another power source
betterquesting.desc: I discovered even another power source. I wonder what I can do with it. Unfortunately it is not compatible with the other power sources.

betterquesting.name: I'm a' firin' mah lazer
betterquesting.desc:
This new power source has some interesting capabilities. I found a way to create lasers which allows me to create chipsets and faster autocrafting.

I need some rare materials from the deepest depths of this planet though.

I need a proper laser room for this setup as well.

betterquesting.name: Useful Gadgets
betterquesting.desc: I designed a few useful gadgets that might prove helpful.

betterquesting.name: Bam!
betterquesting.desc:
I found a way to make a long ranged weapon. I'm pretty confident a long ranged weapon might prove useful.

ONLY ONE OF THESE TASKS NEED TO BE COMPLETED TO FULFILL THIS QUEST

betterquesting.name: Metal Press
betterquesting.desc: I found a new way to make plates and gears etc: pressing ingots with power.

betterquesting.name: Automating Components
betterquesting.desc: Crafting the components in the workbench will get tedious soon, I need to automate that process with an Automated Workbench.

betterquesting.name: Egg came first
betterquesting.desc: I read about making some adhesive, I wonder what happens if I infuse life into it.

betterquesting.name: Small pets
betterquesting.desc: Time to try to infuse life to get some small pets.

betterquesting.name: Automated Crushing
betterquesting.desc: Now with power, I can automate crushing.

betterquesting.name: Replacing manual work
betterquesting.desc: I can now build some more machines that replace manual or semi-manual work like Barrels and Crucibles.

betterquesting.name: More Circuitry
betterquesting.desc: I wondered what I can use all that acidic water for, now I have an idea, to make more circuits and use it as Etching Acid.

betterquesting.name: New Art of Crafting
betterquesting.desc:
With this new circuit I found a new way of crafting, I wonder what I can do with it.

For that I need a lot of resources though. One is Tungstensteel, a new alloy from, well, Tungsten and Steel, the other some glowy essence that I can make from the Glowstone I farmed.

betterquesting.name: Glowing
betterquesting.desc:
I wonder what I can use that Glowing Sand for.

Apparently crystals grow on them over time. I should make a farm. Maybe I can use them some time in the future.

betterquesting.name: A whole new world
betterquesting.desc: I finally found a way to teleport away from this planet, hurray. I wonder what awaits me there. I just need a Gold Block with two portal blocks on top and bottom.

betterquesting.name: Essential
betterquesting.desc:
I read that there is a bee that produces some special Exoria Essence. I wonder what it will be used for. I am pretty sure that it is VERY IMPORTANT to breed this bee.

Also I noticed that some bees need special temperature and humidity requirements. I should check the underground dimension and check if I can breed some bees better there.

betterquesting.name: Basic resources now easier
betterquesting.desc: Now I can get basic resources like Water or Stone much easier with these machines.

betterquesting.name: Industrial Machines
betterquesting.desc:
With one of those two alloys I can make industrial machines.

The first goal is to make Plastic.

betterquesting.name: I feel empowered
betterquesting.desc: To progress further I need a way to empower these crystals.

betterquesting.name: Easier Farming
betterquesting.desc: The industrial machines allow me to make farming easier.

betterquesting.name: Better Power Storage
betterquesting.desc: I have now a better power storage available.

betterquesting.name: Duct Tales
betterquesting.desc: I developed a better way to transport power, items and fluids.

betterquesting.name: Green power
betterquesting.desc: With the farm I can make better power.

betterquesting.name: Power of Choice
betterquesting.desc:
I now have figured out several options of power generation. I have the choice.

ONLY ONE OF THESE TASKS NEED TO BE COMPLETED TO FULFILL THIS QUEST

betterquesting.name: A new way of resource gathering
betterquesting.desc:
I analyzed the properties of Ender Pearls and the results were quite interesting. My long term goal is to build a Void Ore Miner that can gather resource from this Misty World and the Exoria Planet. I just need to install the Exoria Artifact in this device.

To build it I developed a resource that I named Litherite, made from Ender Dust and Diamonds, processed in my Condenser.

betterquesting.name: Solar Power
betterquesting.desc: The same way I have this Ore Miner setup, I can build a big multiblock Solar Panel because I need the power to get the items in a reasonable amount of time.

betterquesting.name: Even more easy resources
betterquesting.desc: Instead of getting ores I can modify the controller to get also world gen blocks and botanic resources.

betterquesting.name: My Compound
betterquesting.desc: To make more alloys and compounds I need to make this Compound Maker I have developed.

betterquesting.name: Next Multiblock Prep Work
betterquesting.desc:
I have another multiblock in mind that will give me more resources. I need to prepare for that though. I found a special form of Iron with some intriguing properties that might help me. 

Out of that Iron I can make a Hammer and an Anvil. The Anvil needs a Magma Block for Heat underneath it.

betterquesting.name: More Drops
betterquesting.desc:
Now I can finally build that multiblock structure that will give me mainly mob drops.

The Factory Layout will show where the blocks should be placed. Somewhere below the middle Power Cell, Importer and Exporter need to be placed.

Now which mob should I engrave into the Controller?

betterquesting.name: Moar Powah!
betterquesting.desc: I found some oil! Now I need a way to extract the oil from the ground: A Pumpjack should work. Crude Oil is not really of good use to me. A Distillation Tower can refine it into something usable. These two multiblocks should give me the power I need soon.

betterquesting.name: Diesel and Dust
betterquesting.desc: With fuel I can finally produce power at a much higher rate. I should build one or more Diesel Generators.

betterquesting.name: Faster processing
betterquesting.desc:
I found a material in this planet's core that would allow me to reach higher temperatures for faster processing.

To get Soul Sand I can for example use Embers processing. The mobs around there should give me the Magma Cream.

betterquesting.name: Powering the Crucible
betterquesting.desc: With passive power I can keep the Crucible now fueled constantly.

betterquesting.name: Better Crafting
betterquesting.desc:
I can now even make a better Crafting Table. It has an inventory and can store recipes.

Also a Portable Crafting Table is very handy to have.

betterquesting.name: Liquid Power
betterquesting.desc: With these liquids or even other liquids I can fuel a Turbine for power as well.

betterquesting.name: Using Mana
betterquesting.desc: Near the Portal I found an infinite source of mana. I should look into using it.

betterquesting.name: Magical Steel
betterquesting.desc: I can also infuse Steel with Mana, allowing me to make many useful things, one of them even allowing me to get rid of the Acid Rain if I feed it Sunflowers.

betterquesting.name: Letting off Steam
betterquesting.desc:
If I make Steam from Diesel I can make even better power.

First I should make a Distiller to transform Water into Distilled Water.

Then I can make a Boiler to create Steam from Diesel and Distilled Water.

I can use the Steam in an Advanced Generator or create a Big Steam Turbine with an Alternator to transform Kinetic Energy to real Power.

betterquesting.name: Experience
betterquesting.desc:
I gathered so much experience. I should put it to good use. I've read about an Enchantment Table. With it I can supposedly enchant tools and armor.

Also some mobs dropped those Ability Totems. I read also about a container that I can use to enchant myself. If I combine 4 Totems in a Crafting Grid I get a random rarer one instead.

And to store experience in liquid form I can use a magical drain and a tank.

betterquesting.name: Pinky
betterquesting.desc: Apparently there is some pink slimey essence in each mob. A special machine can kill and extract this essence. I hope I will be able to use it.

betterquesting.name: Pick your poison
betterquesting.desc: I found a way to get off this planet through another portal. I need to harden a slimey liquid which I call Knightslime. To make it I need 2 machines.

betterquesting.name: Leaving Misty World
betterquesting.desc:
Time to leave the Misty World in the hopes to find back home. I can make another portal and light it the usual way.

To make Knightslime I need the Poison Extract I found from the Sponge Flowers down at the bottom of the Mist. I need to harvest it from the top of those flowers when they are ripe/orange.

betterquesting.name: Disk Storage
betterquesting.desc: Finally I found a good way to automate and store items. I need a special material to do so, reinforced Aluminium, called Duraluminium. It needs power to store items, but it is surely worth it.

betterquesting.name: Long Distance Transfer
betterquesting.desc: If I combine Itemducts with Ender Pearls I can transfer items over longer distances. The Dispatcher - that is how I call this device - needs to be attached to an inventory and can then be linked to other receiving inventories. It can be sped up with upgrades and be configured and filtered.

betterquesting.name: High Tech Bee Breeding
betterquesting.desc: Apparently the processors that I can use for better storage have a secondary purpose. I can use them as well for high tech machines that can breed and manipulate bees.

betterquesting.name: Up in the Air
betterquesting.desc: Finally I found a way to get flight, it is a Simple Jetpack that I can hopefully improve upon later.

betterquesting.name: The magic way
betterquesting.desc:
I found two ways to do things in the past days, the technological and the magic way. I need to use both ways to explore and research the sky and their stars. Given the structures that I found this moon was inhabited by tribes that used both technology and magic.

For the magic way, I need over the course of the next days make always better and better crafting tables. I need to improve my big crafting table and make an even bigger one, then I can finally handcraft a crafting table with magical power.

betterquesting.name: Even more ores
betterquesting.desc:
I developed a method to continuously upgrade the Ore Miner. As soon as I find new ores I should see if I can use this knowledge to upgrade the Ore Miner in the future.

First though I need a better Crafting Table to craft this Ore Miner.

betterquesting.name: The technological way
betterquesting.desc:
I found two ways to do things in the past days, the technological and the magic way. I need to use both ways to explore and research the sky and their stars. Given the structures that I found this moon was inhabited by tribes that used both technology and magic.

I need to explore those metal structures for the technological way. Maybe I can find something that will aid me because I'm out of ideas at the moment. Lots of research has to be done.

Apparently I can't break any of the blocks of the underground structures yet. But maybe I can recreate the Metal Blocks and then start my research.

betterquesting.name: Moon Ores
betterquesting.desc:
I wonder if this moon finally has some useful ores after all the previous planets were barren.

I found some red ore that is resonating. I wonder if I can use this resonating energy to generate more power for my power needs.

betterquesting.name: Technological Research
betterquesting.desc: Now I need to start researching as thorough as possible. It will take some time, but hopefully it will be worth it.

betterquesting.name: Cheaper Metal Blocks
betterquesting.desc: My first success is not big, but I found a cheaper way to make the metal blocks.

betterquesting.name: Neon Energy Research
betterquesting.desc:
I have advanced my research abilities. Now I need energy for researching.

ONLY ONE OF THESE TASKS NEED TO BE COMPLETED TO FULFILL THIS QUEST

betterquesting.name: Support Research
betterquesting.desc:
Now Energy isn't enough for research anymore. Additional support required.

ONLY ONE OF THESE TASKS NEED TO BE COMPLETED TO FULFILL THIS QUEST

betterquesting.name: Magnetite
betterquesting.desc: Magnetite is a very useful resource for later progress. I got the ore from the Void Ore Miner Tier 3.

betterquesting.name: Rocket Science
betterquesting.desc: Finally I can make a simple rocket that leads me to one single new planet. Let me explore it. Hopefully I will find a way to fly to any planet soon.

betterquesting.name: Menelaus Loot
betterquesting.desc: With the resources I found on Menelaus, I can create new alloys that will help me to build a better rocket or spaceship.

betterquesting.name: Aquamarine
betterquesting.desc: I read that there is Aquamarine to be found in Sand which is covered up by water. I should use my Nature's Compass to find Rivers and dig up all the Aquamarine I can find.

betterquesting.name: Starlight Express Power
betterquesting.desc: The Tome also tells me that the stars are emitting special powers at night that can be collected in a liquid. I need to collect this energy and use it to my advantage.

betterquesting.name: Deep Down
betterquesting.desc:
This planet has more to offer that it seems at first glance. Deep down are Rock Crystal ores in rare quantities.

The Resonating Wand should help me finding the Rock Crystals at night.

betterquesting.name: Automating Blue Gems
betterquesting.desc: Researching this Starlight Liquid I found out about how to get Aquamarine Gems in an automated way. If I replace Water with Starlight in a Cobblestone Generator I get Sand instead which has the possibility rarely to generate Aquamarine Shale.

betterquesting.name: Starmetal
betterquesting.desc: If I expose Lead to Starlight I get a new metal which I will call Starmetal. It has some interesting properties. I should create some and use it in my research.

betterquesting.name: Infusing & Resonating
betterquesting.desc: I created an Infuser that can focus the Starlight Energy even more. Infusing Aquamarine Gems creates some Resonating Gems which will be very useful for me in the future.

betterquesting.name: Tier 3 Miner
betterquesting.desc: With Aquamarine, Rock Crystals and Resonating Ore I can upgrade my Miner to Tier 3.

betterquesting.name: Tier 4 Miner
betterquesting.desc: With Magnetite and Resonating Gems I can upgrade my Miner to Tier 4.

betterquesting.name: Extracting Liquids
betterquesting.desc: With the potent Starlight Power I can extract liquids from the ground. I wonder what liquids I will find on this moon.

betterquesting.name: Shiny!
betterquesting.desc: Combining all the potent magic powers yields me a Shining Star of powerful nature.

betterquesting.name: Medium pets
betterquesting.desc: Time to try to infuse life to get some medium sized pets.

betterquesting.name: Large pets
betterquesting.desc: Time to try to infuse life to get some large pets.

betterquesting.name: Concentrated Starlight
betterquesting.desc: I need to setup a base on this moon where I will use the Starlight for crafting. I noticed that aren't many places where the concentration of Starlight is high enough. I developed a device which is able to show me concentrated Starlight.

betterquesting.name: Like a satellite
betterquesting.desc:
To able to fly to other planets, I need to collect data. I probably should launch a few satellites into space.

The Satellite Builder needs to be placed on top of the Power Plug which itself can accept power.

I want to make 3 satellites, each one to collect different data. A satellite needs also data storage and power via some basic solar panels.

I can then track and gather data from satellites in the Satellite Terminal.

betterquesting.name: Team Rocket
betterquesting.desc:
Now I need to launch the satellites into space.

I need a Launch Pad of variable size, a tower at least as high as the finished rocket and a Rocket Assembling Machine. The Rocket itself needs engines and tanks and a Satellite Bay to deploy the satellite. Then I need to link a Rocket Monitoring Station to the Rocket Assembling Machine.

betterquesting.name: A chemical reaction
betterquesting.desc: I need to create Rocket Fuel to be able to launch my rockets. The Hydrogen and Oxygen gasses I found might be suitable. I just need to build a Chemical Reactor to combine those two gasses.

betterquesting.name: Deep Space Nine
betterquesting.desc:
Now I need to build a Space Station where I can do the research and warp to different planets. 

I plan to build the Space Station on another Launch Pad (maybe I will use the same, not sure yet). Instead of the Rocket Assembling Machine I will need a Space Station Assembler. The Space Station I can build out of any blocks and also expand later in space if needed. In the GUI I need to put a Satellite Bay and a Space Station ID Chip.

The Space Station Container needs to go into another Satellite Bay, part of another unmanned rocket which I need to launch into space.

betterquesting.name: Flying up high
betterquesting.desc: Now I can fly to the Space Station. A manned rocket needs a Guidance Computer and Seat instead of a Satellite Bay. In the Guidance Computer the Space Station ID Chip has to be put in.

betterquesting.name: Warp Speed
betterquesting.desc:
Now I am about to evaluate the satellite data. I need a Warp Controller for that. The Warp Controller needs a Planet Id Chip, 100 of each Data and a Warp Artifact for every operation. As Warp Artifact I have only the Exoria Artifact for now.

Then I can build the Warp Core Multiblock to fly to the discovered planets. I needs a lot of Titanium, but I should be able to do that. With Dilithium as fuel the journey can begin.

betterquesting.name: Dilithium Crystals
betterquesting.desc: To be able to warp to the different planets I need Dilithium Crystals. I have the dust, I just need to crystallize it.

betterquesting.name: New Warp Artifact #1
betterquesting.desc: Finding planets is random, but eventually I find a new Warp Artifact that I can add to the Warp Controller (check JEI for Warp Artifact).

betterquesting.name: New Warp Artifact #2
betterquesting.desc: Finding planets is random, but eventually I find a new Warp Artifact that I can add to the Warp Controller (check JEI for Warp Artifact).

betterquesting.name: New Warp Artifact #3
betterquesting.desc: Finding planets is random, but eventually I find a new Warp Artifact that I can add to the Warp Controller (check JEI for Warp Artifact).

betterquesting.name: New Warp Artifact #4
betterquesting.desc: Finding planets is random, but eventually I find a new Warp Artifact that I can add to the Warp Controller (check JEI for Warp Artifact).

betterquesting.name: Finally home
betterquesting.desc: Finally I can go back home. Time to change my life.

betterquesting.name: What happened?
betterquesting.desc:
WHAT ON EARTH IS GOING ON? Everything is destroyed and everyone seems to be dead. My family and friends, no one is around anymore! *sob* What am I going to do now? What happened? The amount of meteors there are doesn't seem like a natural cause to me. I need to find answers. Where can I go to?

I KNOW! The lab where the Portal Room is from where I was sent to Exoria is deep underground. I wonder if it is safe or someone survived there.

betterquesting.name: The Void
betterquesting.desc: So the portal to Exoria is still intact. I wonder who traded with me because no one is here anymore. But there is a new big portal here that is active. Maybe all the people are there? Or I find someone there who knows more!? I should go there. But I should also prepare well because I have no idea what I will encounter.

betterquesting.name: Unfriendly place
betterquesting.desc:
This place is not very friendly. Staying long here doesn't seem very healthy at all. I need to retreat. But before I do, I need to gather some resources that might help me in this otherworldly place.

There is an ore located very rarely and also some fruit near that weird liquid. Eating this fruit makes me apparently immune to the unhealthy air and atmosphere in this dimension.

I need to cultivate that fruit so that I can stay longer in this dimension. I need a special hoe that can till the Soft Bedrock, also the fruit apparently needs darkness. I can also infuse the soil with special materials like Redstone or Lapis to get fruits with special effects.

betterquesting.name: Exploring the void
betterquesting.desc:
With enough fruit I can explore the void and be fine to survive.

I found a Fortress! Other monsters are lurking around here. I wonder if killing those mobs will help me progress.

betterquesting.name: Tech or Magic?
betterquesting.desc:
So far this world has a very magic feeling, but I found a tech use of that skull that I crafted. If one thing this journey has taught me: With tech or magic alone you won't come very far, you have to combine the two to achieve progress. Again I will do this here. I will use this star to construct a few machines that will help me progress.

An Infusion Altar is the first step to create the machines. I need to make good use of the Liquid Void and create power.

betterquesting.name: Voidic Power
betterquesting.desc:
For the machines I want to create I need power. The Liquid Void will generate power for me, but the Liquid Void is so rare.

But I found a solution. Infusing a Beacon seems like a good way. This contraption will transform the power I have plenty of into Liquid Void so that I have lots of Voidic Power.

betterquesting.name: Voidic Steel
betterquesting.desc: To create a Steel variant of this Voidic World I need two machines. One to create a Void Dust variant of Iron and Coal and a second one, a kind of Blast Furnace, to get the Steel. They just need power.

betterquesting.name: Suppressing
betterquesting.desc: Now I found a better way to suppress the voidic damage. I need to charge this Suppressor and if I hold it I am safe of the voidic damage.

betterquesting.name: Above the void
betterquesting.desc: Going on top of this dimension makes me die instantly. But with a special potion I can survive the void damage I would take.

betterquesting.name: Empires of the Void
betterquesting.desc:
Now that I can go above the Void, I found some cities with new monsters. I hope defeating them helps me progress. I have the feeling I am getting close to finding the answers I am waiting for.

With the Astral Essence I can create an even more potent skull. Placing it summons a special monster that I need to defeat.

betterquesting.name: Xia
betterquesting.desc:
Before I defeated this monster, it told me what happened.

cPeople at my home planet created this portal to the void dimension for a possible new exile location, not realizing it was inhabited by these powerful creatures. They didn't like the people intruding into their home and unleashed a meteor storm on my home planet.cccf

So what do I do now? I see only one possible solution, take vengeance on what they did. I owe this to my family, my friends and humanity.

Apparently their leader Xia is in a new dimension named also Xia. Let me defeat him. I need to throw this Star I have into a Ring of Soft Bedrock with another layer of Soft Bedrock underneath.

betterquesting.name: Tier 6 Miner
betterquesting.desc:
Not sure if I need this Tier 6 Miner, but I can craft it now with the resources I have from this dimension.

Cosmic Material is very rare to be found everywhere in the Void Dimension.

betterquesting.name: Bee Breeding
betterquesting.desc:
To be able to breed bees I need something better than Bee Houses, some sort of Apiary.

I also need to pacify them with their own honey so that I can analyze them properly.

betterquesting.name: Reload Quests
betterquesting.desc: On each pack update, claim this quest to update all quests.

betterquesting.name: Compact Cables
betterquesting.desc: After I have discovered special cables that can transfer data, I applied that knowledge to better cables that can transfer basically everything, be it energy, items, liquids or redstone.

betterquesting.name: Extending machines
betterquesting.desc: A lot of machines that I use need to be provided with so many things that 6 sides to a block are a limiting factor. I came up with a device that is able to represent an adjacent block so that I have more sides available to me.

betterquesting.name: Staying longer in the mist
betterquesting.desc:
I discovered that my Filter Coal gets polluted at varying speeds depending on where I am below the mist. I found out that it depends on how far I am away from the center of this planet.

I modified my compass now another time so that this device is able to track my distance from the center when I am below the mist. Obviously I want to be far away from the center.

betterquesting.name: Survival
betterquesting.desc: Surviving is highest priority

betterquesting.name: Magical Life
betterquesting.desc: Exploring the world is necessary to leave this planet

betterquesting.name: Resource Automation
betterquesting.desc: I need more resources to be able to progress

betterquesting.name: Tech Progression
betterquesting.desc: In the new dimension I can work towards teching up

betterquesting.name: Power up
betterquesting.desc: Getting power is the next big task

betterquesting.name: Researching the stars
betterquesting.desc: I need to research the stars to find more planets

betterquesting.name: Take the long way home
betterquesting.desc: Planet hopping until I find my way back home.
